name: yourorg/clean-mvc-skeleton
description: Clean Architecture MVC skeleton (Framework + App layers)

suggest.ext-redis: Required for Redis Pub/Sub broker and cache driver (native C performance)
suggest.ext-rdkafka: Required for high-performance Kafka broker (10-50x faster than pure PHP, requires librdkafka C library)
suggest.ext-amqp: Optional for RabbitMQ performance boost (php-amqplib pure PHP works well)
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Pure PHP AMQP client for RabbitMQ (already installed)
suggest.nmred/kafka-php: Pure PHP Kafka client (already installed, fallback if ext-rdkafka unavailable)
